entry.title: WIND WARNING, Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:38 a.m. MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 14.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 this afternoon. High 14. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 7:55 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near the British Columbia border overnight. Wind west 70 km/h gusting to 100. Low 8. Forecast issued 7:55 AM MDT Sunday 9 April 2023
